body: Well he will give up when the pregnant belly comes..lol
@Kami Nana I mean, a lot of people do this. I wouldn't but I would actually come pick her up every day. If something is wrong, you would feel it immediately.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

This is the kind of shit I don't understand, a lot of people knew this girl yet no one even tried to check if she's doing alright at her house and maybe finding out what they have done to her? personally I would've always kept close to the girl I love and always come to pick her up everyday while walking her home after school and go with her whenever or to wherever she wants to go. and if something even the smallest things happens to her I will be able to notice that instantly and do something about it. Now that is what you call protecting your precious one. fucking douchebags that do nothing deserve to be virgins and die all alone in the corner of their dark rooms with one noodle arm that holds the tissue and the other much more muscle like but barely being able to fap since their dicks are so small.
PS. NTR is not bad at all its the dark fantasy some people would like to see and dream about to release their stress and avoid doing it in real life.
